text.section:
A person entitled to file an application for a sentence review under this subtitle has the right to be represented by counsel:
to determine whether to seek a sentence review; and
to file an application for a sentence review.

The counsel representing a person for a sentence review may be:
retained by a person who is entitled to file an application for review under this subtitle;
appointed by the sentencing judge; or
provided under Title 16 of this article.
